name: AMG 2
description:
A Mining Game 2 is a multiplayer mining simulator in which you command  & build a town of miners to get ores to sell for gold. Raise an Army to fight off incoming attacks or to go on adventures solo or with friends. Complete to be the richest town of them all.

Features (0.0.2)
  • 32 Total upgrades
  • AutoMiners
  • 7 Player pickaxes
  • Territory Expansion
  • more updates every Tuesday
Background

Development for AMG2 Started during the Covid-19 Quarantine situation because I was bored, A Mining Game 2 is really a complete Revamp of the original Browser game AMG.

I wanted to make a new game instead of updating the original as I've grown fondly of 3D games over 2D and the original A Mining Game wasn't my idea, It was passed down to me through the originally developer "Buckey". Making a new game means I can put my own spin on the project but stay true to the classic roots of the game.

Updates will be coming out weekly, Every Tuesday at 3PM EST. So keep coming back to enjoy more.
